not_found_message: The searched item is not found in our database

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: A small, red fruit with tiny seeds on its outer surface. It has a sweet flavor and a juicy texture.

items.name: Pineapple
items.description: A large tropical fruit with a spiky, rough outer skin and sweet, juicy yellow flesh inside. It has a tangy-sweet flavor.

items.name: Watermelon
items.description: A large, oblong fruit with a thick green rind and sweet, juicy red flesh dotted with black seeds. It has a refreshing, thirst-quenching taste.

items.name: Mango
items.description: A tropical fruit with a thin, smooth skin that ranges in color from green to yellow to red. It has juicy, sweet flesh with a rich, aromatic flavor.
